essential.caption: A summary table of the main crime types, the number of incidents and change over time.
alttext: Violence has decreased from 2,063,000 in 1981 to 1,285,000 in 2019.
Homicide has decreased from 1,047 in 2003 to 617 in 2019.
Knife or sharp instrument crime has increased from 30,620 in 2011 to 44,771 in 2019.
Theft has decreased from 6,292,000 in 1981 to 3,578,000 in 2019.
Burglary has decreased from 890,099 in 2003 to 380,567 in 2019.
Vehicle offences has decreased from 1,074,659 in 2003 to 441,351 in 2019.
Robbery has decreased from 110,271 in 2003 to 82,542 in 2019.
Fraud has increased from 3,395,000 in 2017 to 3,797,000 in 2019.
Computer misuse has decreased from 1,764,000 in 2017 to 1,006,000 in 2019.
